message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
My turn to propose a fairer split. This is a good deal for you before inflation eats away more of your share.
I'll compromise, but still think I deserve a bit more
I'm meeting you closer to the middle, but we need to agree soon!  Inflation is hurting your share more than mine.

Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm offering you more than I want, but inflation is about to seriously cut into your share.  Take this deal!
